price: (91) Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?[1295]
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: [1295]- Consume the offerings placed before them.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
